title: Associate Strategy Consultant (all genders)
description:
Join our global team of experts at diconium. You will work on projects that create value from software, data, and AI, enabling businesses to achieve more with less. You will collaborate with over 2,300 fellow experts to support global leading companies in maximizing the impact of digital efforts and delivering solutions with measurable business impact. We prioritize people and genuine human connection, ensuring a supportive and inclusive work environment. And we give you maximum flexibility thanks to our hybrid workplace.

#### Overview
In our projects, you will independently support executives from well-known clients in various industries in digitizing their core business, embedded in our project teams. Depending on your professional experience, you will take responsibility for specific topics, subprojects, and the further development of our internal processes and methods. You will translate the latest technology trends into innovative business ideas and derive sustainable business models and strategies. Through customer, competitor, and best-practice analyses, you create well-founded decision-making bases and actively shape innovative customer workshop formats, playing a crucial role in them.

#### Required Skills
- An above-average completed degree, ideally with a focus on business, technology, IT, or innovation
- Relevant professional experience and/or internships in the strategy-digital-E-commerce area of a company or in an established management consulting firm
- Experience and enthusiasm for at least one of the following topics: Digital business models, corporate strategy, change management, transformation management, agile organizational development, multi-channel, customer experience, online marketing, CRM, M-E-commerce, IT systems, IoT, connected life
- Strong analytical skills
- A high willingness to learn
- Convincing presentation skills
- Effective communication in both German and English

#### Preferred Skills
- Experience in one or more of the following areas: Digital business models, corporate strategy, change management, transformation management, agile organizational development, multi-channel, customer experience, online marketing, CRM, M-E-commerce, IT systems, IoT, connected life

#### Experience Requirements
- Years of experience: 1+ to 5+ years
- Category of experience: Entry-level to Senior-level
- Specific domain experience: Strategy consulting, digital transformation

#### Position Details
- Work Location: Hybrid (flexible according to personal preference)

#### Additional Information
Offers professional and personal growth through training programs, free language courses, competence centers, and an active tech community; flexible work-life balance with hybrid work, workation, flexible hours, parental support, and sabbaticals; embraces diversity and sustainability through the Sustainability Hub, diverse communities, Diversity Taskforce, and after-work activities; comprehensive benefits including public transport tickets, job bikes, health offers, supplementary insurances, a pension plan, and various discounts. Values and recognizes the unique perspectives and experiences of each individual, welcoming applications equally and standing up against discrimination and harassment based on gender, age, skin color, religion, sexual orientation, origin, disability, gender identity, and other protected characteristics.

For consultant positions:
- Step 1: Submit your CV and reference letter
- Step 2: Invited for a first video call
- Step 3: Organize an onsite assessment day with various interviews and case studies
- Step 4: If you like us and we like you, welcome to diconium!

For partner positions:
- Step 1: Submit your CV and reference letter
- Step 2: Invited for a first video call
- Step 3: Schedule an interview with a senior partner or managing director
- Step 4: Organize an onsite assessment day with various interviews and case studies
- Step 5: If you like us and we like you, welcome to diconium!

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Your contact person is Isabell segieth@diconium.com.
short_description: Support executives in digitizing business; translate tech trends into innovations; analyze markets; develop strategies. Mgmt consulting exp., tech focus, analytical skills, bilingualism required. Hybrid work, personal & professional growth, sustainability initiatives, comprehensive benefits offered.

title: IT Systemadministrator (m/w/d)
description:
Support the Future of Safety Technology by Joining Allegion's Pioneering Team!

At SimonsVoss Technologies, we are committed to building and maintaining a diverse and inclusive workplace. We are always looking for talented individuals to join our team and shape the future of safety technology.

#### Role Overview
As a bIT Systemadministratorin m/w/d, you will play a key role in maintaining the stability and continuous development of our IT infrastructure. You will collaborate closely with various departments to ensure our IT solutions meet business needs and support our employees effectively.

#### Key Responsibilities
- Configuring, maintaining, and monitoring Windows servers and workstations.
- Managing Active Directory, including user accounts, group policies, and security configurations.
- Implementing automation processes to enhance efficiency.
- Developing scripts to optimize IT processes.
- Utilizing VMWare and Azure for improved infrastructure.
- Managing backup solutions for data security.
- Automating processes using PowerShell and Baramundi.
- Creating and documenting concepts and technical documentation in the change process.
- Troubleshooting IT infrastructure issues for optimization.

#### Required Technical Skills
- Windows-Administration: Configuration, management, and monitoring of Windows servers and workstations.
- Active Directory Management: Management of user accounts, group policies, and security configurations.
- Software-Automatisierung: Implementation of automation processes to improve efficiency.
- Skripting: Development of scripts to optimize IT processes.
- Virtualisierung: Use of VMWare and experience with Azure cloud.
- Backup: Management of backup solutions for data security.
- Automatisierung: Use of PowerShell and Baramundi for process automation.
- Dokumentation: Creation of concepts and technical documentation in the change process.
- Troubleshooting: Analysis and resolution of infrastructure issues for optimization.

#### Required Soft Skills
- Team collaboration: Working closely with IT teams to meet system and security requirements.
- Strong problem-solving skills: Identifying and resolving complex issues.
- Communication skills: Effective communication with team members and stakeholders.

#### Preferred/Nice-to-have Skills
- Comprehensive knowledge of networking administration and IT security.
- Experience with Office365 structures.
- Experience with SCCM, Baramundi, or similar client deployment solutions.
- Good knowledge of server virtualization with VMWare and Azure Cloud skills.
- Proficiency in German and English.

#### Experience Requirements
- Years of experience: 5+ years.
- Category of experience: Mid-level.
- Specific domain experience: IT system administration, with a focus on Windows server administration starting from version 2012.

#### Position Details
- Work Location: Hybrid (2 days in office).

#### Additional Information
- Work-Life-Balance: Flexible through a floating model, including compensatory time off, mobile work possible on 2 days a week, 30 days of leave without probation period.
- Sustainable Mobility: Cost-effective leasing of work bicycles and e-bikes.
- Health: Monthly fitness allowance of 30€ gross, employee assistance program for all life issues, free drinks and fresh fruits.
- Family and Pensions: Monthly pension contribution of up to 250€ gross, subsidization of the company's pension plan 40€ plus 20% of the conversion rate, exclusive employee discounts.
- Growth and Education: Structured and inspiring onboarding process, practical training in the in-house training center, access to learning platforms, mentoring for development and career paths.
- Culture: Engaging spirit, flat organizational structure, a multi-national team of 15 nations, large willingness to help and cohesion, many great events.

description:
Full-time position starting in March 2025, based in Berlin.

You are passionate about music industry development and wish to play a role in strategic investments in company areas and business models, shaping the future? Do you possess strong analytical skills, a sharp eye for details, and the ability to think big picture?

Your primary responsibilities include conducting market and business model analyses in the music industry and exploring strategic investment opportunities. You will lead projects as part of our local Business Development team, working closely with the international Ventures & Investments team. You will collaborate with teams in our region and support various strategic projects. Responsibilities include contributing to business analysis, financial modeling, due diligence checks, and deal execution. You will prepare business presentations, conduct analyses, and follow up on meetings.

Your profile:
- Strong analytical skills with a solid understanding of key financial KPIs.
- Passion for the music industry and interest in understanding its structures and business models.
- Previous experience in corporate advisory, investment banking, M&A, or a related field is desirable.
- Clear and compelling presentation of data and numbers using Excel and PowerPoint.
- Fluency in German and English.
- Proactive and reliable team player who can handle sensitive information.
- Working within Sony Music’s culture that fosters diversity, innovation, and the freedom to challenge and revolutionize processes and methods.
- Individual benefits packages including public transportation allowance, job bike, and sports subscription.
- Flexible working hours and home office.
- Corporate pension.
- Streaming subscription of your choice.
- Concert and events across Germany and in our trendy headquarters in Schöneberg.
- Exclusive training programs in the company's academy.
- Trust in leading your projects to success.

How to Apply:
- Submit a CV or creative form showcasing who you are, what you can do, and why Sony Music sounds better with you.
- Photo, age, marital status, and information about your parents and other personal details are not required.

We look forward to you.

Regular events such as the legendary New Year's celebration strengthen team spirit and create new contacts.

### Key Responsibilities

- Ensuring customer satisfaction by reducing complaints.

- Implementation of rescheduling of subsidies.

- Post-processing of incoming cost estimates until billing.

- Editing and maintenance of customer/patient data via EDV.
- Ensuring customer satisfaction by reducing complaints.
- Contributing to process optimization through constructive improvement proposals.

- Commercial training.

- Independent working style within a team.
- Good knowledge in Microsoft Office. ERP system experience is desirable.
- Excellent German language skills in writing and speaking. Basic English skills are desirable.

title: Business Development Representative / BDR (d/f/m)
description:
Join the ticketing revolution at vivenu! Vivenu was founded in Germany with a global mission to redefine ticketing for event organizers. The event industry has long relied on outdated systems that no longer meet the demands of the digital age. Our platform enables event organizers in sports, live entertainment, and cultural venues to tailor their ticketing based on individual needs and strategies.

Despite rapid growth and profitability, we are expanding globally with offices in Europe and the USA. Renowned tech investors and industry experts like the San Francisco 49ers, along with notable clients like Schalke 04, the Grammys, and the Hockenheimring, are already partnering with us.

To achieve our ambitious goals, we are seeking passionate individuals to complete our dream team. Are you ready to be part of the ticketing revolution?

As a Business Development Representative - BDR at vivenu, you will:

1. Build new customer relationships and sell our products to potential clients.
2. Develop expertise in a specific segment (Sports, Live Entertainment, Cultural Venues) and attend relevant events and client meetings.
3. Collaborate with our sales colleagues to deliver product demos and convert leads to customers.
4. Sharpen your software sales skills and lay the foundation for a long-term career.

We are looking for candidates who:

- Have a completed education and initial experience in a sales role, including internships or apprentice jobs.
- Bring technical affinity and entrepreneurial thinking.
- Have high energy and resilience.
- Enjoy challenges and learning new skills.
- Speak fluent German and English.

At vivenu, you are at the heart of innovation, shaping the future of ticketing. You work in a dynamic environment that constantly evolves and presents new challenges. You take real responsibility from the start of your projects and decisions. Your ideas and effort directly influence the company's success.

We invest in your personal development by providing coaching, mentoring, and workshops. Your growth is at the center of our hearts. Because your success is also our success.

You benefit from great perks. In addition to the latest Apple hardware, we offer you many extras like a bike to work, team-building events, and an unlimited selection of drinks and snacks. We put your well-being at the forefront so you can focus entirely on your work.

We actively promote inclusion. We value diversity and believe that different perspectives and backgrounds strengthen our team. We welcome all applications, regardless of gender, origin, sexual orientation, age, religion, or other individual characteristics. Everyone finds their place to bring their skills and ideas, because we believe that innovation arises from diversity. Check out our mission statement and corporate values here.

Required Technical Skills:  
- N/A  

Required Soft Skills:  
- Sales mindset  
- Customer relationship management  
- Product knowledge  
- Business acumen  
- Negotiation and communication skills  
- Entrepreneurial thinking  

Preferred/Nice-to-have Skills:  
- B2B software experience  
- Experience in the sports, live entertainment, or cultural venues industry  

Experience Requirements:  
- Years of experience: 0-2 years  
- Category of experience: Entry-level  
- Specific domain experience: Sales, particularly in software or B2B sectors  

Position Details:  
- Work Location: Onsite  

Additional Information:  
Offers flexible working conditions, a supportive and innovative work environment, and a variety of extras such as free bike-to-work arrangements, team-building events, and a wide range of refreshments. Strong emphasis on diversity and inclusion.
short_description: Business Development Representative - BDR: Aufbau neuer Kundenkontakte, Produktüberzeugung, Zusammenarbeit mit Sales, technische Affinität, hohes Energiestand, B2B-Software, Deutsch/englisch, dynamische Umgebung.
